title: Introductory Sessions
desc: The Introductory Sessions are designed to give people a taste of the benefits of being in Innovation Nation Sri Lanka with the platform for new entrepreneurs.

title: Design Thinking
desc: The Design Thinking Session is a creative problem-solving session that is based on the principles of design thinking to design better products faster, reduce costs, and increase profits.

title: Frontline: Playing the Market Right
desc: The sessions give an idea to assess the market for your product which implies the importance of carrying out a proper qualitative and quantitative assessment of the market.

title: Reinventing Business Models in a Disruptive World
desc: The sessions with the theme of ‘Reinventing Business Models in a Disruptive World’ elucidate the Business strategies and the right type of business model canvas.

title: Sales and UX
desc: The Sales & UX sessions give an idea on product design, sales, emerging trends in UX, and user experiences in the field of technology startups and corporates.

title: Serving and Surviving
desc: The session on Serving and Surviving is based on social entrepreneurship, strategies for growth, sustainability of the startup, and the social benefits of the startups.

title: Business Development and Risk Assessments for Startups
desc: The session focused on ‘Business Development & Risk Assessments for Startups’ to get the know-how of handling proper risk-assessments and figuring out their entries to the global market.

title: The Legal Know-How of Startups
desc: The session on ‘The Legal Know-How of startups' is aware of the nuances of corporate law to build a corporate world around us in the future business.
